quest.name: The Ceruleum Must Flow
journal: Papawazu would offer you another commission and a chance to admire him, if the mood strikes you.

The shipment of processed ceruleum will finally resume, to the satisfaction of all parties─well, except the coblyns, but creatures of their sort have no say, and dead ones doubly so. Report the news to Syntgoht at the Sapphire Avenue Exchange.
Syntgoht is relieved, though vexed by the price hike. Once the goods reach him in a few days, he should in turn be able to fill his orders.
objectives: Speak with Syntgoht at the Sapphire Avenue Exchange.

dialogue.name: PAPAWAZU
dialogue.text: Anyway! The ceruleum must flow. No more delays in shipping─another brilliant coup by Papawazu! Oh, is that a feather? For my cap? Why, thank you very much!

dialogue.name: PAPAWAZU
dialogue.text: Sooo, you can tell Syntgoht that his shipment will be there in just a few days. Unfortunately, there'll be a wee increase in price. Security surcharge, you know! Everybody does it.

dialogue.name: SYNTGOHT
dialogue.text: Welcome, welcome! What might a discerning─oh, it's you, Forename. Talked to Papawazu? Really! He said a matter of days?

dialogue.name: SYNTGOHT
dialogue.text: So, my dear ladyman, you're telling me they're shipping what's owed me but charging more for it. I wish Amajina and all his sons the joy of my gil. I hope it gives them gout.

dialogue.name: SYNTGOHT
dialogue.text: I do appreciate you sorting this out, and with that puttock Papawazu, no less. A discerning middleman such as myself will certainly remember you for future commissions!
